Package org.drip.portfolioconstruction.objective

Class CustomTransactionChargeTerm

java.lang.Object
org.drip.portfolioconstruction.core.Block
org.drip.portfolioconstruction.optimizer.FormulationTerm
org.drip.portfolioconstruction.optimizer.ObjectiveTerm
org.drip.portfolioconstruction.objective.CustomTransactionChargeTerm
public abstract class CustomTransactionChargeTerm
extends ObjectiveTerm
CustomTransactionChargeTerm implements the Objective Term that models the Custom Transaction Charge associated with a Portfolio Transaction.

  • Module = Portfolio Core Module
  • Library = Asset Allocation Analytics
  • Project = Portfolio Construction under Allocation Constraints
  • Package = Portfolio Construction Objective Term Suite


Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
